tool_description: An API that scrape the latest CGC comics added on the online market.
name: Certified Comics
title: Certified Comics

api_list.name: Get comicconnect latest published CGC comics datas._copy
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back only CGC comics that has been put for sale on pullbox.ca
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://certified-comics.p.rapidapi.com/comics/pullbox"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "certified-comics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get comicconnect latest published CGC comics datas.
api_list.description:
This endpoint will return back only CGC comics that has been put for sale on comicconnect.com

This website works with auctions.

api_list.name: Get all latest published CGC comics datas
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all CGC comics that has been put for sale on every websites used in the API.
api_list.code:
